attributes.action: To abolish some taxes so that it puts more money in to families pockets
attributes.additional_details: To abolish some taxes so that it puts more money into a families pocket rather than going into the governments pocket
attributes.background: To abolish some of these taxes as everything is going up in price but wages stay low

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Review all taxes with a view to reducing or abolishing taxes where possible: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654161

If there are specific taxes you want to be abolished you could start a new petition requesting this.
